name: HTML Editor PRO - with AI
description: Explore endless possibilities of Web Development in Android with HTML Editor Pro.
long_description: Take your mobile development to the next level with HTML Editor PRO. This professional-grade laboratory tool features an integrated AI assistant, real-time preview, and full support for modern web standards. Whether you're debugging on the go or building complex prototypes, our editor provides a high-performance environment optimized for the Android filesystem. It includes advanced syntax highlighting, auto-completion, and direct integration with GitHub, making it the definitive choice for professional web developers working in mobile contexts.

name: Karbon Sites
description: Go beyond static snippets. Generate, refine, and deploy entire web projects with AI in a powerful and intuitive editor.
long_description: Karbon Sites is the next evolution in web project management. Engineered for rapid prototyping and deployment, it allows you to generate entire project architectures from a single prompt. Our cloud-based laboratory environment handles the heavy lifting of environment configuration, letting you focus on refining your vision. With Karbon, moving from a conceptual laboratory experiment to a live production site takes minutes, not days. It features advanced AI interpolation, modular component injection, and one-click global deployment.

name: VerboVisions - AI Image Generator
description: Transform your words into captivating visuals with VerboVisons.
long_description: Unlock the power of visual synthesis with VerboVisions. This AI-driven imaging laboratory translates complex linguistic prompts into stunning, high-definition digital artwork. Using state-of-the-art neural networks trained on vast creative datasets, VerboVisions understands nuance, style, and composition at a granular level. From photorealistic laboratory renderings to abstract digital concepts, the application provides an intuitive interface for infinite creative exploration on mobile devices.
